author: PlayStation
description:
Pre-order now: https://www.playstation.com/games/little-nightmares-3/ 

An ill-fated attempt to bring fun to the funfair. Do what you must to survive the ride, little ones. 

#LittleNightmares III comes to PlayStation 5 and PlayStation 4 on October 10th, 2025. 

#ps5 #ps5games #ps4games #ps4
title: Little Nightmares III - "You're in for a Ride" Pre-Order Trailer | PS5 & PS4 Games

author: PlayStation
description:
https://www.playstation.com/games/little-nightmares-3/

From the creaking carousel to the flickering lights—and the many disturbing faces—you're in for a ride.

Watch this 10-minute gameplay walkthrough of the Carnevale and brace yourselves, little ones. 

#ps5 #ps5games #ps4 #ps4games #LittleNightmares
title: Little Nightmares III - Carnevale 10-minute Gameplay Walkthrough | PS5 & PS4 Games

author: PlayStation
description:
Explore the impossible halls of Hotel Infinity, a roomscale-first reality-breaking exploration game coming to PS VR2 in 2025. 

#ps5 ps5games #psvr2 #psvr2games #hotelinfinity
title: Hotel Infinity - Announce Trailer | PS VR2 Games

author: PlayStation
description:
https://store.playstation.com/concept/10009629/

Dreams of Another is a third-person exploration-action game built around the philosophical theme: "No Creation Without Destruction." Unlike traditional TPS games where shooting destroys objects, here, shooting materializes and creates from an otherwise abstract, fragmented world.

On PS VR2, this technique truly shines, enveloping the player in a dreamlike world where your body feels as though it’s dissolving into the environment.

#ps5 #ps5games #psvr2 #psvr2games
title: Dreams of Another - PS VR2 Gameplay Reveal Trailer | PS5 & PS VR2 Games

author: PlayStation
description:
Wishlist now: https://store.playstation.com/concept/10012427

Become the commander, control the battlefield, and campaign for victory in Grit and Valor - 1949. Now coming to VR, August 21st 2025.

Get closer to the action than ever before and get hands on with the action with all-new VR specific features built to make you feel like the true commander you always wanted to be.

Coming in 2025 to PS VR2.

#ps5 #psvr2 #psvr2games #gritandvalor #steampunk #roguelite #vr #playstation #announcement
title: Grit and Valor -1949 - Announce Trailer | PS VR2 Games

author: PlayStation
description:
https://www.playstation.com/games/kayak-vr-mirage/

Kayak through the mysterious caves and lush cenotes of Yucatán in Mexico, guided by your flashlight. Paddle beneath stalactites illuminated by glowworms, and make your way through collapsing tunnels in an abandoned mine as the current starts picking up.

Yucatán is available now to explore solo or with a friend.

#ps5 #psvr2 #psvr2games
title: Kayak VR: Mirage - Yucatán DLC (including whitewater) | PS VR2 Games

author: PlayStation
description:
The chickens are back!

Chicken Run: Eggstraction follows Frizzle on her first solo mission since Dawn of the Nugget to rescue chickens from twisted farms and villainous foes!

You’ll sneak, puzzle-solve, and rally your feathery crew to freedom between hilarious cut scenes packed with fun.

1–2 player co-op

Stealth + strategy + laughs = eggstra fun

Coming soon to PlayStation!

#ps5 #ps5games #ps4 #ps4games #ChickenRunEggstraction
title: Chicken Run: Eggstraction - Announce Trailer | PS5 & PS4 Games

author: PlayStation
description:
Wishlist today: https://store.playstation.com/concept/10015527

Crash through walls and tear down buildings in Instruments of Destruction, a vehicle-action game featuring advanced physics-based demolition. Pilot 130+ unique vehicles across scores of challenge-packed missions or design your own contraptions and wreck highly-interactive sandbox worlds. 

Coming later in 2025. 

#ps5 #ps5games
title: Instruments of Destruction - Announcement Trailer | PS5 Games

author: PlayStation
description:
https://www.playstation.com/en-us/games/farming-simulator-25/

Project Motor Racing, the ultra-authentic racing sim from publisher GIANTS Software and developer Straight4 Studios, will hit the track on November 25th. Race across eras in 70+ authentic cars across 10 iconic classes on 27 track layouts. Watch the introduction of its challenging career mode. Get ready for the next era of racing simulation and pre-order now! 

#ps5 #ps5games
title: Project Motor Racing - Career Mode Trailer | PS5 Games
